blocks.name: tailfval
blocks.content: The tail function for a directed set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm tailfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdir), wceq(cfv(ctail, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ctail, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cdir), wceq(cfv(ctail, c0), cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(cuni(cuni(c0)), universe))
  uniexg(c0, cdir)
  uniexg(cuni(c0), universe)
  mptexg(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), universe, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, cdir, cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), universe, ctail, cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imaeq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  df-tail(hs0, s0)
  mpteq1d(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c1, wcel(c0, cdir))
  syl5req(cuni(cuni(c0)), c1, cdm(c0), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dirdm(c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdir)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm tailfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ DirRel →(tail ` c0)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { s0 })))
  ⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd((tail ` c0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { s0 })), (s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 })), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  mpdan(c0 ∈ DirRel, (tail ` c0)=(s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 })), (s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 }))∈ 𝕌)
  3syl(c0 ∈ DirRel, (s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 }))∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, cdir)
  uniexg(⋃ c0, universe)
  mptexg(s0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, universe, (c0 " { s0 }))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, cdir, (s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 })), universe, ctail, (s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ hs0 ↦(hs0 " { s0 })))
  mpteq12dv(s0, ⋃ ⋃ hs0, (hs0 " { s0 }), ⋃ ⋃ c0, (c0 " { s0 }), hs0 = c0)
  unieqd(⋃ hs0, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  imaeq1(hs0, c0, { s0 })
  df-tail(hs0, s0)
  mpteq1d(s0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, (c0 " { s0 }), c1, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  syl5req(⋃ ⋃ c0, c1, dom(c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dirdm(c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, ⋃ c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdir)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ↦(c0 " { s0 })))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tailval
blocks.content: The tail of an element in a directed set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm tailval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ctail, c0), c1), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ctail, c0), c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(ctail, c0), c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(ctail, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  tailfval(hs0, c0, c2)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), c1), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), universe))
  id(wcel(c1, c2))
  imaexg(c0, cdir, csn(c1))
  fvmptg(hs0, c1, c2, cima(c0, csn(c1)), universe, cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))
  imaeq2d(c0, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, csn(c1)))
}

thm tailval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→((tail ` c0)` c1)=(c0 " { c1 }))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((tail ` c0)` c1), (c0 " { c1 }), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 }))` c1), (c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, ((tail ` c0)` c1)=((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 }))` c1))
  fveq1d((tail ` c0), c1, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  tailfval(hs0, c0, c2)
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 }))` c1)=(c0 " { c1 }), c1 ∈ c2, (c0 " { c1 })∈ 𝕌)
  id(c1 ∈ c2)
  imaexg(c0, cdir, { c1 })
  fvmptg(hs0, c1, c2, (c0 " { c1 }), universe, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })), (c0 " { hs0 }))
  imaeq2d(c0, { hs0 }, { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 " { c1 }))
}

blocks.name: tailf
blocks.content: The tail function of a directed set sends its elements to its subsets. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)

  syl5eqel(c1, universe, cdm(c0), wcel(c0, cdir))

thm tailf(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ DirRel →((tail ` c0): c1 → P(c1)))
  ⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((tail ` c0): c1 → P(c1)), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })): c1 → P(c1)))
  sylib(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })): c1 → P(c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 " { hs0 })∈ P(c1)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, c1, c0 ∈ DirRel, (c0 " { hs0 })∈ P(c1))
  mpbird(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c0 " { hs0 })∈ P(c1), (c0 " { hs0 })⊆ c1)
  syl5sseq((c0 " { hs0 }), c1, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  sstri((c0 " { hs0 }), ⋃ ⋃ c0, ran(c0))
  imassrn(c0, { hs0 })
  sstri(ran(c0), ⋃ ⋃ c0, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  ssun2(ran(c0), dom(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5req(⋃ ⋃ c0, c1, dom(c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dirdm(c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((c0 " { hs0 })∈ P(c1)↔(c0 " { hs0 })⊆ c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eqel(c1, universe, dom(c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dmexg(c0, cdir)
  elpw2g(c1, universe, (c0 " { hs0 }))
  fmpt(hs0, c1, (c0 " { hs0 }), P(c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })))
  feq1d((tail ` c0), c1, P(c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 " { hs0 })), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  tailfval(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ DirRel)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm filnetlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 = ⋃ ⋃ c1 ∧(c2 ∈(Fil ` c3)→(c0 ⊆(c2 × c3)∧ c1 ∈ DirRel)))
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c2,({ s0 } × s0))
  ⊣ c1 = { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0)∧(1st ` s2)⊆(1st ` s1))}

blocks.name: filnet
blocks.content: A filter has the same convergence and clustering properties as some net. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Aug-2015.)

thm filnet(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wrex(s0, cdir, wex(s1, wa(wf(cv(s1), cdm(cv(s0)), c1), wceq(c0, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(s1)), crn(cfv(ctail, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  filnetlem4(s0, s1, hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))), wss(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))
  eqid(ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))
  eqid(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))), wss(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.copab.s(s0, hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))), wss(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))), wss(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))
  diff.ciun.s(s0, hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))), wss(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), ciun(hs2, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs2)), cv(hs2))))
